messages.subject: New Manga
messages.msgSnippet: In case I hadn t mentioned before, I ve posted a new manga in the Manga Originals section-- Shinsengumi Monogatari: Episode 1 . It s a parody of Jidai
messages.messageBody:
In case I hadn't mentioned before, I've posted a new manga in the
"Manga Originals" section-- "Shinsengumi Monogatari: Episode 1". It's
a parody of Jidai Monogatari, and this particular one is about the
::ahem:: action in Chapter 6...

--M.
